content.text: 0) Line a 15-in baking pan with foil; coat foil with nonstick cooking spray.
1) In a bowl, combine the bread crumbs, garlic, Parmesan cheese, parsley, thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the bread crumbs"@22:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "garlic"@40:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "Parmesan cheese"@48:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "parsley"@65:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "thyme"@74:79 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "rosemary"@81:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@91:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@100:106 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add butter; toss to coat evenly.
4) Spray with nonstick cooking spray and pat with bread crumb mixture.
5) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 35-40 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "176 degrees C"@-1:-1/ TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "35-40 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until fish flakes easily with a fork"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
